name: Usability Testing Figma Template
description:
Usability Testing Figma Template


A Figma template containing different usability testing activities for your concepts and prototypes


What type of testing can you do with it?


Ideal for remote moderated usability testing sessions for the following activities:

  • First-Click Testing
  • User Shadowing
  • Interactive Prototypes Testing
  • Concept Validation
  • Copy Validation
  • A/B Testing


Set up your own questions and activities using these starting points. View in Prototype Mode to include animated transitions and interactive prototypes.
